title: Fonts from the book Rumo
content:
Hi,  
I would like to know if you can help me with identifying these three fonts, they are a scan from the book Rumo.

Thanks in advance,  
Petra

Font 1:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106083512im_/http:/typophile.com/files/font_1_6304.jpg)

Font 2:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106083512im_/http:/typophile.com/files/font_2_4163.jpg)

Font 3:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106083512im_/http:/typophile.com/files/font_3_3697.jpg)
author: PR

comments.content:
I read that one.

Font 3 (text face): [ITC Mendoza](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106083512/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/mendoza-roman/).

#1 looks like **[SI New](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106083512/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Apple&ffam=SI%20New%20-%20Regular&fid=eaa52210817d4955de38753fd31bb64e&fsize=60&text=Obenwelt%20Der%20Silberne%20Faden&wrap=2)** Apple font manually condensed and modified.  
More specifically the copyright of SI New font says: "1990-91 Apple Computer Inc. 1990-91 Type Solutions Inc. 1990-91 The Font Bureau Inc."

#2 must be **[Scriptek](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106083512/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Letraset&ffam=Scriptek%20-%20Regular&fid=2c358e446161db38ac7c49006ffdd7be&fsize=60&text=Stellt%20euch%20einen%20Schrank&wrap=2)** by David Quay (Letraset, 1992) also available from ITC

#3 looks like **[ITC Mendoza Roman (Book)](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106083512/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=ITC&ffam=Mendoza%20Roman%20OS%20ITC%20TT%20-%20Book&fid=36f6b0becabacea7f25c620314bc2049&fsize=60&text=aber%20keines%20ein%20Rumos%20Alleinh%20gemei&wrap=2)** by José Mendoza y Almeida (ITC, 1991) also available from Adobe & Monotype

Wow, you're great! Many thanks!

Petra
